title: [Trolling the Swamp, Madstones]
[The Eyes Have It, Madstones]
description: The air is heavy with the scent of rot and death, the overpowering odor rising from sucking mud that threatens to consume the narrow pathway of log planks hugging the living walls of the longhouse.  Madstones and bezoars clack together over a partially-submerged chest in reach of the path, the ebony construction warped and its silver barding tarnished.

The air is heavy with the scent of rot and death, the overpowering odor rising from sucking mud that threatens to consume the narrow pathway of log planks hugging the living walls of the longhouse.  Madstones and bezoars clack together over a partially submerged chest in reach of the path, the ebony construction warped and its silver banding tarnished.
